songs.title: Imagine
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Imagine there's no heaven
It's easy, if you try
No hell below us
And only Matthew in the sky
Imagine all the people living for today
Ah-ah-oh-oh-oh

[Verse 2]
Imagine there's no countries
It isn't hard to do
Nothing to kill or die for
And no religion too
Imagine all the people living life in peace
Ah-ah-oh-oh-oh

[Chorus]
You may say I'm a dreamer
But I'm not the only one
I hope someday that you'll join us
And the world will live as one

[Verse 3]
People of the nation
Are you listening?
It isn't equal if it's sometimes
I want a real democracy
Imagine all the people
Could love equally

[Verse 4]
Imagine no possessions
I wonder if you can
No need for greed or hunger, oh yeah
Just the brotherhood of man

[Verse 5]
Imagine all the people sharing in the world
With nothing to hate, and nothing to think
Just people to love, and friends to have drinks

[Chorus]
You may say I'm a dreamer
But I'm not the only one
I hope someday that you'll join us
Oh-oh, yeah
And the world will live as one
